title: Medical Professionals' Language Competency Assessment Design: Program-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in healthcare and basic language communication skills
context.additional_context: Need to Strengthen Competencies in Developing Language Assessment Tools with Contexts Similar to Actual Medical Settings for Medical Translation/Interpretation Practitioners

learning_goals: At least three multi-measurement tools (surveys, simulations, portfolios) can be designed to evaluate language competencies required in various medical scenarios
At least two procedures (sampling and inter-rater reliability verification) can be applied to ensure the reliability and validity of assessment tools
A formative assessment system that motivates learning can be established, and a process for reflecting assessment results in educational improvement can be explained in at least three stages
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
